Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Ongoing \On"go`ing\, n. The act of going forward; progress; (pl.) affairs; business; current events. [1913 Webster]
The common ongoings of this our commonplace world, and everyday life. --Prof. Wilson. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: ongoing \on"go`ing\, a. Occurring at present; progressing; in progress; continuing; not {past}, {completed}, or {future}; as, an ongoing petition drive; an ongoing effort. [PJC]
